rules.description: when holding account trade date is entered CAM reps name is captured

rules.fullName: Reference Operations Support Current step Returned
rules.description: Reference Operations Support Current step Returned
If "Type of S125 NSF" is "No Oustanding S125 NSF", then "No Outstanding S125 NSF"
If "Type of S125 NSF" is "S125" and "S125-Cancelled Plan Due to NSF", then "S125 NSF - Plan Cancelled"
If "Type of S125 Status" is "S125" and "S125-Cancelled Plan Due to NSF" and "S125 Plan Reinstated" is not null, then " S125 NSF Resolved - Plan Reinstated"

Populate Docusign Expiration Date upon below conditions for COVID Request Reference Operations Support 1) 16 day after Date PaperWork Sent is populated 2) AND if Date paperwork Recieved equals null AND Docusign_Expiration_Date__c is null
